articles.author: Whitney Wild and Jeremy Herb, CNN
articles.title: Secret Service identified potential missing text messages on phones of 10 individuals
articles.description: Secret Service investigators were scrutinizing the phones of 10 Secret Service personnel that contained metadata showing text messages were sent and received around January 6, 2021, but were not retained, two sources told CNN.
articles.content: (CNN)Secret Service investigators were scrutinizing the phones of 10 Secret Service personnel that contained metadata showing text messages were sent and received around January 6, 2021, but were not… [+3590 chars]

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: How the January 6 committee used Fox News against Donald Trump
articles.description: Everyone knows that Donald Trump is a devotee of Fox News. During his presidency, he would regularly live tweet his favorite shows and viewed primetime hosts like Sean Hannity as de facto advisers to his White House.

articles.title: Kinzinger: 'We've proven different components of a criminal case against Trump' - CNN Video
articles.description: Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-IL) talks with CNN's Jim Sciutto about the final January 6 hearing and how he feels the committee has proven criminal exposure against former President Trump. The committee presented damning new evidence highlighting then-President Dona…

articles.author: Katelyn Polantz, CNN Reporter, Crime, Justice
articles.title: DC lawyers' disciplinary board says ex-DOJ official Jeffrey Clark lied in his attempts to overturn 2020 election
articles.description: Former Justice Department official Jeffrey Clark, whom Donald Trump wanted to install as attorney general so he could use the department to help him overturn the 2020 election, violated his professional code of conduct, the disciplinary office governing lawye…

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: The slow-mo moment that everyone will remember from the latest January 6 committee hearing
articles.description: It took more than a year, but the January 6 committee got its revenge on Sen. Josh Hawley Thursday night.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.title: Video shows Josh Hawley running from rioters on Jan. 6 - CNN Video
articles.description: At the latest hearing on Jan. 6, the select committee played video of Sen. Josh Hawley (R-MO) fleeing the Capitol during the violent riot. Before the riot, Hawley raised his fist in solidarity with protesters. Former Capitol Officer Michael Fanone discusses t…

articles.author: By Katelyn Polantz, Tierney Sneed, JiMin Lee and Aditi Sangal, CNN
articles.title: Steve Bannon's trial: Live updates
articles.description: Former Trump aide Steve Bannon is on trial on contempt of Congress charges for his failure to comply with Jan. 6 House committee subpoenas last year. Follow here for live news updates.
articles.content: As she neared the end of her closing, prosecutor Molly Gaston described Steve Bannon's conduct as a betrayal to his duties as a citizen, and said that he had "contempt" for the government and for pay… [+1260 chars]

articles.author: Opinion by Frida Ghitis
articles.title: Opinion: Why Trump didn't want to lift a finger on January 6
articles.description: Frida Ghitis writes the January 6 hearings proved that former President Donald Trump went far beyond dereliction of duty as the insurrection unfolded. He was an active, if indirect, participant in the effort to stop the certification of Joe Biden's victory.
articles.content: Frida Ghitis, (@fridaghitis) a former CNN producer and correspondent, is a world affairs columnist. She is a frequent opinion contributor to CNN, a contributing columnist to The Washington Post and a… [+7181 chars]

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: The damning case against Trump that the Jan. 6 committee has uncovered -- and what comes next
articles.description: Stay tuned. Season two is coming.

articles.author: Manu Raju, CNN Chief Congressional Correspondent
articles.title: Tammy Baldwin, who is gay, confronted Marco Rubio about calling same-sex marriage vote a 'stupid waste of time'
articles.description: As he was walking on an elevator on Wednesday, GOP Sen. Marco Rubio of Florida told CNN that a vote on a bill to codify same-sex marriage was a "stupid waste of time."
